+ + + + +``` + +### 🖼️ Step 4: Add Project Images + +Create an `images` folder in your project root and add: + +``` +images/ +├── fitbodyflex/ +│ ├── screenshot-1.jpg +│ ├── screenshot-2.jpg +│ └── logo.png +├── mydigitalresume/ +│ ├── homepage.jpg +│ ├── about-section.jpg +│ └── contact-form.jpg +└── [other projects...] +``` + +### ⚙️ Step 5: Update Portfolio Links + +In `portfolio.html`, update the "View Case Study" links: + +```html + +View Case Study + + +View Case Study +``` + +### 🎯 Step 6: Quick Update Checklist + +For each project, update: + +- [ ] GitHub repository URL +- [ ] Case study page link +- [ ] Project status (Live, Beta, In Development) +- [ ] Technology tags +- [ ] Project description +- [ ] Repository link in footer + +### 🔧 Example: FitBodyFlex Updates + +```html + +

+``` + +### 🚀 Pro Tips + +1. **SEO Optimization**: Add proper meta descriptions to each case study page +2. **Performance**: Optimize images before uploading (use WebP format if possible) +3. **Analytics**: Add Google Analytics tracking to see which projects get the most views +4. **Social Sharing**: Add Open Graph meta tags for better social media previews +5. **Mobile Testing**: Test all case study pages on mobile devices + +### 📈 Future Enhancements + +Consider adding: +- Live demo embeds +- Code snippet highlights +- Project metrics/statistics +- Client testimonials (if applicable) +- Video walkthroughs +- Interactive elements + +### 🆘 Need Help? + +If you need assistance updating any of these elements: +1. Check the existing code structure in other pages +2. Use browser developer tools to test changes +3. Keep the same design patterns for consistency + +--- + +**Remember**: Update your portfolio regularly as you complete new projects or improve existing ones! \ No newline at end of file
